meanings.definition: The top stone of a wall or building.
meanings.sent1: The copestone of the castle wall was intricately carved.
meanings.sent2: The mason carefully placed the copestone to complete the structure.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel balanced on the copestone, pretending to be the king of the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her graduation was the copestone of her academic journey, marking her success.
meanings.sent5: The copestone gleamed in the sunlight, standing proudly atop the ancient wall.

meanings.definition: A finishing touch or crowning achievement.
meanings.sent1: The final exam was the copestone of her semester, determining her grade.
meanings.sent2: The artist added the copestone to the painting, enhancing its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake with candles was the copestone of the party, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent4: Winning the championship was the copestone of their season, a moment of glory.
meanings.sent5: The golden trophy served as the copestone of his collection, symbolizing his success.
